clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of ACT-541468 in Healthy Japanese and Caucasian Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-center, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Randomized Study to Investigate the Tolerability, Safety, Pharmacokinetics, and Pharmacodynamics of Single- and Multiple-dose ACT-541468 in Healthy Japanese and Caucasian Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: So far, ACT-541468 has been studied mainly in Caucasian subjects. The present study will bridge results obtained in Caucasian subjects to those in Japanese subjects.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.time_frame: From Day1 pre-dose to 48 hours after the last dose on Day 5
primary_outcome.description: The geometric mean Cmax values will be calculated based on pharmacokinetic (PK) blood sampling

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration-time curves during a dosing interval [AUC(0-24)] of ACT-541468
primary_outcome.time_frame: From Day1 pre-dose to 48 hours after the last dose on Day 5
primary_outcome.description: The geometric mean AUC(0-24) values will be calculated based on PK blood sampling

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to reach Cmax (tmax) of ACT-541468
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Day1 pre-dose to 48 hours after the last dose on Day 5
secondary_outcome.description: The median tmax values will be calculated based on PK blood sampling

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Day1 pre-dose to 48 hours after the last dose on Day 5
secondary_outcome.description: The geometric mean t(1/2) values will be calculated based on PK blood sampling

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration-time curves from time 0 to 8 h [AUC(0-8)]
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Day1 pre-dose to 48 hours after the last dose on Day 5
secondary_outcome.description: The geometric mean AUC(0-8) values will be calculated based on PK blood sampling
The percentage of subjects with treatment-emergent adverse events will be reported

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of adverse events leading to premature discontinuation of study treatment
secondary_outcome.description: The number of subjects who prematurely discontinued the study treatment due to an adverse event will be reported

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of any clinical relevant findings in ECG variables
secondary_outcome.description: The number of subjects with any treatment-emergent electrocardiogram (ECG) abnormalities will be reported

arm_group.description: 8 Japanese and 8 Caucasian subjects will receive 25 mg (1 capsule) of ACT-541468 once daily for 5 days
8 Japanese and 8 Caucasian subjects will receive 50 mg (2 capsules) of ACT-541468 once daily for 5 days

2 Japanese / 2 Caucasian subjects will receive 1 placebo capsule to match subjects in the ACT-541468 (25 mg) group and 2 other Japanese / 2 Caucasian subjects will receive 2 placebo capsules to match subjects in the ACT-541468 (50 mg) group
